botConfig.name: system.intentConfidenceThreshold
botConfig.description: The minimum confidence score required to match a skill's intent with user input. If there is no match, the transition action is set to 'unresolvedIntent'.(Minimum value 0, maximum value 1)

botConfig.name: system.intentConfidenceWinMargin
botConfig.description: Only the top intent that exceeds the confidence threshold is picked if it is the highest ranking intent which exceeds the confidence threshold. If other intents that exceed the confidence threshold have scores that are within that of the top intent by less than the win margin, these intents are also presented to the user. (Minimum value 0, maximum value 1)
